CustomField.description: Total_Contact_Hours__c can be used, because in CourseAPI we're displaying only final courses. Course can be final, only if all sessions except Reunion are confirmed.
CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT( Has_Virtual_Teaching_Content__c ) ,
"A " & TEXT(Total_Contact_Hours__c) & " hour course. This consists of " & TEXT(Count_of_Confirmed_Sessions__c) & " " & IF(Count_of_Confirmed_Sessions__c < 2, "session", "sessions") & ". ",
"Your course will be made up of " & IF(Count_of_Confirmed_Sessions__c < 2, "a" & TEXT(Total_Online_Session_Hours__c) & "hour live, interactive session delivered by Zoom by your course leader", TEXT(Total_Online_Session_Hours__c) & " hours of live, interactive session(s) delivered via Zoom") & IF(Total_Virtual_Support_Hours__c <= 0, ". ", " and at least " & TEXT(Total_Virtual_Support_Hours__c) & " hours of enhanced personalised support from your course leader delivered via a closed messaging group. ") ) &
IF(Count_of_Unconfirmed_Reunion_Sessions__c > 0, BR() & $Label.Confirmation_Notification_Course_Reunion, "" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used for CourseAPI.
CustomField.label: Summary
